The Ladys College was the first open school for mages in Silverymoon. It was considered by many to be the heart of the Conclave of Silverymoon.
The education system of Ladys College was unique, as unlike the other schools at the time, it didn’t utilize the traditional apprentice-master dynamic, in which a master took on several apprentices, and slowly taught them magic in exchange for servitude. The Ladys College took on aspiring mages as students, not as servants.  
The radically different teaching philosophy of Ladys College made the school a polarizing institution, though even its detractors agreed that its graduates were not only talented wizards, but also well rounded scholars.
The school was established in the , by Elué Dualen and Lynx.
By the , the student system of Lady’s College became the standard in magical education throughout Silverymoon,
